subject: Climate & Environment
title: The Battery Storage Revolution
description: A quick win: understand The Battery Storage Revolution.

hook.text: In 2017, Elon Musk bet he could build the world's biggest battery in 100 days or it was free.

buildup.text: He won the bet. South Australia's battery saved millions in its first year of operation.

discovery.text: Lithium-ion battery costs dropped 97% since 1991, making grid storage suddenly affordable.

twist.text: New chemistries like iron-air and sodium-ion promise even cheaper long-duration storage.

punchline.text: The grid's best backup fits in a shipping container.
